name: Blanca Magica
description:
[DEMO]

Jump, shoot and explore this mysterious area as you gain new abilites!

What awaits at the end of the place?

CONTROLS

  • Arrows: Move
  • Z: Jump
  • X: Shoot
  • Enter: Pause
